quote: Keep others in suspense, cultivate an air of unpredictability. – Robert Greene
fact: The only two days of the year in which there are no professional sports games--MLB, NBA, NHL, or NFL--are the day before and the day after the Major League All-Star Game.
joke: I've started telling everyone about the benefits of eating dried grapes. It's all about raisin awareness.
